entry.title: [MINUTES] Dev Meeting 2017-09-18
entry.summary: According to the given context, it has been highlighted that the Onion error format will change. It is not clearly mentioned what exactly this means, but it seems to be related to some technical aspect of a system or software. Additionally, it has been mentioned that much is deferred to 1.1. Again, it is not clear what this refers to specifically, but it could potentially be related to a version update or upgrade in a technology platform. The provided link leads to a Google document, but there is no information given about its content or relevance to the highlights mentioned above. Therefore, it is difficult to draw any further conclusions or insights from the context provided. It is important to note that additional context or clarification would be needed in order to fully understand the significance of these highlights and their implications.
